definition: gas/air/smell/weather/to make angry/to annoy/to get angry/vital energy/qi

sentences.english: Spitting in the street is considered to be very bad mannered.
sentences.chinese: 拂逆地吐痰，在街上吐痰是很紧张的坏习气。

sentences.english: Marius had preserved the religious habits of his childhood.
sentences.chinese: 马吕斯一直保持着幼年时养成的那些宗教习气。

sentences.english: My friend has, fortunately for him, not acquired this type of behaviour.
sentences.chinese: 我的这个朋友，他是幸运的，没有养成这类习气。

sentences.english: The relative bodhicitta thought only suppresses self-clinging, so that the defilements become inactive.
sentences.chinese: 世俗菩提心只是通过压制我执而暂时克制染污习气。

sentences.english: He has picked up some bad habits at that club.
sentences.chinese: 他在那个俱乐部沾染上了一些坏习气。

sentences.english: Here is a report on the eating habits of small-volume testing.
sentences.chinese: 这儿有一份关于饮食习气的小测试卷。

sentences.english: The U. S. government just loves red tapes.
sentences.chinese: 美国政府就喜欢繁文缛节，官僚习气。

sentences.english: I never got used to going to bed so early.
sentences.chinese: 我始末没能习气恁地早上床困觉。

sentences.english: Encouragement and delightful learning atmosphere are very important in my classroom.
sentences.chinese: 在我的教室里，我注重赏识教育及愉快的学习气氛。

sentences.english: On the contrary, the regiments , close to the old China, had many elements of conservatism.
sentences.chinese: 相反，杂牌军旧习气较重，保守色彩较浓。

sentences.english: At least 10 minutes, upright habit of thought.
sentences.chinese: 每次至少10分钟，习气抬头挺胸的觉得。

sentences.english: A man's own good-breeding is his best security against other people's ill manners.
sentences.chinese: 自身教养好是抵制他人坏习气的最好保证。

sentences.english: Eradication of Vasana results in Atman-Jnana or Self Knowledge.
sentences.chinese: 习气的清除，带来的结果是神我的智慧或自性的知识。

sentences.english: To rise early is a good habit (whelloch) we should cultivate.
sentences.chinese: 早起是我们应该养成的一种良好习气。

sentences.english: The Master Cleanse: a terrifying and potentially dangerous diet.
sentences.chinese: 清肠禁食是一种可怕也风险的饮食习气。

sentences.english: We come here to change our habits so we can turn away from the ordinary to cultivate the sagely.
sentences.chinese: 来到这里，就是要改掉我们的习气，才能转凡修圣。

definition: old habits are hard to change (idiom)
to love ease and comfort and hate work (idiom)
